title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
brief: A story of the decadent lifestyle of the wealthy in the Roaring Twenties.

title: The Lean Startup
author: Eric Ries
brief: A guide for entrepreneurs and business leaders to create successful startups.

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams
brief: An adventure of an unwitting human and his alien friend as they travel through space.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
brief: A coming-of-age story about a teenager's struggle with alienation and identity.

title: The Art of War
author: Sun Tzu
brief: A classic Chinese military treatise on strategy and tactics.

title: The Da Vinci Code
author: Dan Brown
brief: A mystery thriller about a cryptographer and a symbologist unraveling a conspiracy surrounding the Holy Grail.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
brief: A story about racial injustice and the loss of innocence in a small Southern town.

title: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
brief: An epic high fantasy novel about a hobbit's journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
brief: A philosophical novel about a shepherd's journey to find his personal legend and fulfill his destiny.

author: George Orwell
brief: A dystopian novel about a totalitarian society where individualism and independent thinking are outlawed.

title: The Art of Happiness
author: Dalai Lama XIV and Howard C. Cutler
brief: A book about the Dalai Lama's teachings on happiness and the human condition.

title: The Odyssey
author: Homer
brief: An epic poem about the Greek hero Odysseus and his journey home after the Trojan War.

title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
author: Oscar Wilde
brief: A novel about a young man's descent into corruption and moral decay.

title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
brief: A guide to spiritual enlightenment based on the concept of living in the present moment.

title: The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn
author: Mark Twain
brief: A novel about a young boy's journey down the Mississippi River with an escaped slave.

title: The Complete Sherlock Holmes
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
brief: A novel about a young boy's journey down the Mississippi River with an escaped slave.
